document_data.name: Gist Estate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gist Estate''' was home of the [[patriar]] [[Gist]] family of [[dye]] merchants of [[Baldur's Gate]], located in the [[Upper City]] [[Baldur's Gate/Manorborn|Manorborn]] neighborhood.
document_data.Location: The Gist Estate was located roughly in the middle of the westernmost part of the Upper City, just three blocks away from the [[Manor Gate]], and there blocks away from the [[Sea Gate (Baldur's Gate)|Sea Gate]].
